group_device_limitation.title: Group Device Has Limited API Support
group_device_limitation.description:
The device **{device_name}** is a Govee Home app group device.

These devices have **limited support**:
- Control commands work (on/off, brightness, color)
- State queries fail - uses optimistic state tracking

This is a Govee API limitation. For accurate state, control individual devices.

auth_failed.title: Govee Authentication Failed
auth_failed.description:
The Govee API key is no longer valid.

**How to fix:**
1. Go to Settings → Devices & Services → Govee
2. Click 'Reconfigure'
3. Enter a valid API key
